column1: Smoque BBQ////Food quality - don't get your hopes up. If you like this style of ribs and Barbecue
column2: then these are for you. The ribs are meaty and pretty lean
column3: but firmer than we like. The rub was tasty
column5: and the Memphis sauce was decent (maybe the Carolina Sauce - ew - is an acquired taste). The brisket was OK
column7: and it's a good thing they give you plenty of sauce
column8: because it helps. The sides are gross
column9: like they're trying to convince their audience that this is what good sides taste like. Don't waste your time or your money.
